roleset.name: connect again

role.descr: first thing being connected, focused argument
second thing arg1 is connected to

example.name: reconnect-v: Args 0 & 1 only
example.text: Pacific Gas& Electric cannot reconnect electricity until it is certain there are no gas leaks.
example.arg: until it is certain there are no gas leaks.

example.name: reconnect-v: Connected things in separate constituents
example.text: He reconnected the boiler to the gas supply.

example.name: reconnection-n
example.text: * SPR -LRB- subtree pruning and regrafting -RRB- , TBR -LRB- tree bisection and reconnection -RRB- , Swofford and Olsen

roleset.note: RECONNECT-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to connect.01. (from reconnect.01-v)
RECONNECTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
